generated_body: The article titled "Supporting your adult children can ruin your retirement plans" is likely to explore the financial implications of providing ongoing support to adult children. Readers may expect to find an analysis of how this support can affect retirement savings and long-term financial stability. The piece could discuss common scenarios in which parents feel compelled to assist with expenses such as housing or education, potentially leading to increased financial strain. Furthermore, it may include expert insights or case studies illustrating the delicate balance between familial support and personal financial health, highlighting the challenges parents face in prioritizing their own retirement needs.
